newsitem.title: ESTONIA: EARLY AFTERNOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 16.
newsitem.headline: EARLY AFTERNOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 16.

text.p: These are the main headlines reported reported by Kuku Radio on Wednesday in the early afternoon. Reuters has not verified these reports and cannot vouch for their accuracy.
- The fall in dairy prices should slow this spring, milk producers said.
- The project to repair the Tallinn-Narva railway will cost 480 million kroons.
